trans-unit.source: Represents a read-only collection of client script blocks that are contained within a Web Form or user control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示在設計階段中 Web Forms 或使用者控制項所內含之用戶端指令碼區塊的唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> class represents a `script` block that is contained in a document (a Web Form, Web server control, a content page, or a master page) at design time.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection>類別代表`script`包含在設計階段於文件 （Web Form、 Web 伺服器控制項，內容的頁面上或主版頁面） 的區塊。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> class to set or examine client script elements that are contained in a Web Forms document on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>設定，或檢查用戶端指令碼項目包含在設計介面上的 Web Form 文件中的類別。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the collection of client script elements that are contained within the Web document by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 擷取用戶端指令碼元素所使用之 Web 文件內所包含的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Add a client script element to the Web document by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.AddClientScriptToDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用將用戶端指令碼項目加入至 Web 文件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.AddClientScriptToDocument%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add client script elements at run time, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要在執行階段中將用戶端指令碼項目，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> class represents script elements at design time that execute on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection>類別代表用戶端上執行的設計階段的指令碼項目。

trans-unit.source: Because the `script` elements that are generated for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> objects are not run on the server, the elements do not contain the `runat="server"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 因為`script`為所產生的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection>物件不會在伺服器上執行、 不包含之項目的`runat="server"`屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem" /> elements used to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem" /> 元素的陣列，可以用來初始化集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If `clientScriptItems` is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) or does not contain any elements, the constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`clientScriptItems`是`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，或未包含任何元素，空的建構函式初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the items in the `clientScriptItems` array are used to set the items for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 否則中的項目`clientScriptItems`陣列用來設定的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is typically used in classes that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection.%23ctor%2A>建構函式通常用在類別中衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>類別。

trans-unit.source: Visual designers implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A> method to return a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> object for the client script elements in a Web document at design time.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化設計工具實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A>方法以傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection>用戶端指令碼中的項目設計階段的 Web 文件的物件。
